zeus.agents
Class ZeusAgent

java.lang.Object
  zeus.agents.BasicAgent
      zeus.agents.ZeusAgent
public class ZeusAgent
extends BasicAgent

This class implements the core functionality of all Zeus Task Agents. Every task agent implementation created by the Zeus toolkit includes a call to the ZeusAgent constructor, which creates and initialises all the agent's internal components and stores references to them in its AgentContext.

This class is of particular interest to developers because it provides methods that allow the agent state to be interrogated and changed, as well listing all the listener classes that can be added to monitor the agent's state.
